landDesc: Yak Spirit is built to give users
ofTokenSwap: of token swap on the avalanche network. We rest on the shoulders of Yield Yak Swap, which finds
theBestOffer: the best offer among all DEX`es
andYakSpirit: , and Yak Spirit enhance it with price chart and comparison with other aggregators. Search the best price, lower price slippage, execute with one click!
landFeat3: Automatic quotes fetching — always up-to-date quotes — fastest updates and trading experience
landFeat4: Enables arbitrage trades (to/from the same asset)

landFeat6: With community in mind — feel free to contribute!
footerYak: Tool for defi users. YakSpirit finds the best price & low slippage execution for dex trades using YakSwap
